title: Farooq Sattar lauds leadership for Pakistan’s recent diplomatic achievements
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 06 (APP):Muttahida Qaumi Movement (MQM) Pakistan leader Dr Farooq Sattar on Monday lauded the country’s leadership for their remarkable roles in achieving recent diplomatic successes for Pakistan.
Speaking on the floor of the National Assembly, Dr Farooq Sattar said that, on behalf of MQM Pakistan and particularly the people of Sindh who have given the party their mandate, he wished to acknowledge and appreciate Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif, Chief of Army Staff (COAS) Field Marshal Syed Asim Munir, and Foreign Minister and Deputy Prime Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar for strengthening Pakistan’s image on the international front.
He said, that the entire nation takes pride in the achievements made by Pakistan on the external front in recent days.
